subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Williams recovered from a slow start to win her first match after nearly a year off the WTA Tour, rallying past Tsvetana Pironkova, 1-6, 6-3, 6-4.
snippet: Williams recovered from a slow start to win her first match after nearly a year off the WTA Tour, rallying past Tsvetana Pironkova, 1-6, 6-3, 6-4.
